Section.Catchline: Department of Corrections to enact rules and regulations relating to compacts; limitation on assessments.

Subsection.Text: The Department of Corrections may adopt rules and expend funds as necessary to carry out the terms, conditions, and intents of a compact entered into by the state pursuant to s. 949.07.

Notwithstanding subsection (2) of article X of s. 949.07, the state shall reduce the amount paid as the state’s assessment under the compact entered into under s. 949.07 so that the total collected from the annual assessment does not exceed the amount appropriated for the assessment by the Legislature for any single fiscal year.
